text: Morning <!channel> before y'all switch over to wall, can we quickly make sure that everything we want to send over to Patrick is buttoned up please? I'd like to make sure to get that to him today :D thanks!
good morning! Sorry to hear you’re sick. I’m genuinely shocked that Im not - but I’ll take it
Thanks. Yeah it sucks.
so - Jason and I putting together the deck from Friday and the video.
I think we (and by “we” I mean you Rob :wink: ) should also let Patrick know that we can put together a more robust package if he needs that to help sell it through
Great. I’ll reach out.
my concern with the current deck is that I’m not sure it will have the context he’ll need to pitch it back to the whole BL team - too bad he doesn’t have a Link system to help with that :wink:
haha! Nice one!
but seriously - I think we might need to put something together that actually writes out what we talked about
I do too
I wont have time to get that done today though
so Im hoping this will do for now
FWIW I think I could probably put something together by Monday. MAYBE Friday, but that might be pushing it as it’s a pretty busy week

Yeah my plan is to say something along the lines of “Here’s the material we presented on Friday for your own personal reference. Given that this presentation was geared towards introducing the concept and doesn’t ahve a lot of context, we’d like to put together a more robust package. Do you have some time to hop on a call and let us knwo what you need to sell this tot he team?"
sure
I might phrase it such that we encourage him to look through what we’re sending, and make note of where he could use more context before we talk
Perfect
When do you think you’ll have 1.0 ready?
pretty quick here
Awesome. Thansk!
sure thing
